titles.title: Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022
Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022

A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in the State of Vermont for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic River System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022
This bill designates for study specified segments of the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in Vermont for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
